text: The women's 1500 metres race of the 2014–15 ISU Speed Skating World Cup 7, arranged in the Gunda Niemann-Stirnemann-Halle in Erfurt, Germany, will be held on 21 March 2015. ==Result== The race took place on Saturday, 21 March, scheduled in the afternoon session, at 14:56. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" !
